name: The Dead Prince Demo
description:
This is a Demo of the upcoming game The Dead Prince

The Dead Prince is a turn based stealth puzzle game where you play a blood magic assassin fulfilling the pact his family made long ago. The Sultan’s enemies are closing in, use your assortment of magical abilities to sneak through bases, take down guards, and assassinate your target.

Use an assortment of powers

You will strategically navigate fixed spaces on a grid to avoid enemies and take out your target or infiltrate well-guarded locations. Your powers allow you to distract guards and avoid obstacles but your resources aren't infinite.

Sneak through bases

The multiple paths, collectables, and challenges bring replayability and the power to choose your own path.

Choose your own path Feature List
  • Challenging stealth puzzles with multiple solutions
  • 8 unique powers
  • Different enemy types with distinct dangers
  • Beautiful pixel art visuals

           

Link to Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1810530/The_Dead_Prince/?utm_source=itch

Link to Discord: https://discord.gg/dBgpf7QZVB

Link to Twitter: https://twitter.com/StudioLintex
